column2: Achieve a climate-resilient society status, fully adapted to the unavoidable impacts of climate change
column5: This target is assigned to the Climate Resilience sub-theme because it aims to achieve a society that is fully adapted to the impacts of climate change.
column6: The target's focus on climate resilience aligns with the sub-theme's objective of building resilience to climate change.

column2: Reduce of 55% GHG emissions compared to 1990 levels (2040 target under discussion)
column5: This target is assigned to the Greenhouse Gas Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce GHG emissions by 55% compared to 1990 levels.
column6: The target's focus on reducing GHG emissions aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing greenhouse gas emissions.

column2: Achieve an EU net greenhouse gas removal of 310 million tonnes CO2 equivalent per year for the land use, land use change and forestry (LULUCF) sector, by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the Carbon Sequestration sub-theme because it aims to achieve a net greenhouse gas removal of 310 million tonnes CO2 equivalent per year for the LULUCF sector.
column6: The target's focus on carbon sequestration aligns with the sub-theme's objective of removing carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

column2: Achieve climate neutrality by 2050
column5: This target is assigned to the Climate Neutrality sub-theme because it aims to achieve climate neutrality by 2050.
column6: The target's focus on climate neutrality aligns with the sub-theme's objective of reaching net-zero emissions.

column2: The share of renewable energy in the electricity mix should double to 55-60%, and projections show a share of around 84% by 2050
column5: This target is assigned to the Renewable Energy sub-theme because it aims to increase the share of renewable energy in the electricity mix.
column6: The target's focus on renewable energy aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting renewable energy sources.

column2: By 2030, the share of renewable energy in the heating and cooling sector shall increase by at least 1.1 percentage points as an annual average
column5: This target is assigned to the Renewable Energy sub-theme because it aims to increase the share of renewable energy in the heating and cooling sector.
column6: The target's focus on renewable energy aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting renewable energy sources.

column2: Each Member State shall ensure that at least 3% of the total floor area of heated and/or cooled buildings that are owned by public bodies is renovated each year
column5: This target is assigned to the Energy Efficiency sub-theme because it aims to renovate buildings to improve energy efficiency.
column6: The target's focus on energy efficiency aligns with the sub-theme's objective of reducing energy consumption.

column2: Doubling the current deployment rate of individual heat pumps, resulting in a cumulative 10 million units by 2027 and 30 million units by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the Heat Pumps sub-theme because it aims to increase the deployment of heat pumps.
column6: The target's focus on heat pumps aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting heat pump technology.

column2: The EU will need to install, on average, approximately 45 GW per year of PV to reach the share of 45% of energy coming from renewables set out in the REPowerEU Plan
column5: This target is assigned to the Solar Energy sub-theme because it aims to increase the installation of photovoltaic (PV) systems.
column6: The target's focus on solar energy aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting solar energy.

column2: Energy demand to be covered by solar heat and geothermal should at least triple
column5: This target is assigned to the Geothermal Energy sub-theme because it aims to increase the use of geothermal energy.
column6: The target's focus on geothermal energy aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting geothermal energy sources.

column2: Over this decade, the EU will need to install, on average, approximately 45 GW per year of PV to reach the share of 45% of energy coming from renewables set out in the REPowerEU Plan
column5: This target is assigned to the Solar Energy sub-theme because it aims to increase the installation of photovoltaic (PV) systems.
column6: The target's focus on solar energy aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting solar energy.

column2: The EU will need to increase its wind power capacity to reach the target of at least 40% of its electricity coming from wind power by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the Wind Energy sub-theme because it aims to increase the use of wind power.
column6: The target's focus on wind energy aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting wind energy sources.

column2: Reduce landfill to a maximum of 10% of municipal waste
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Waste Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce the amount of municipal waste sent to landfills.
column6: The target's focus on waste reduction aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing waste.

column2: Recycling or preparing for re-use 65% of all packaging waste by 2025, 70% by 2030
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Recycling sub-theme because it aims to increase the recycling rate of packaging waste.
column6: The target's focus on recycling aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting recycling practices.

column2: Member States shall take measures to achieve a sustained reduction in the consumption of lightweight plastic carrier bags on their territory
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Plastic Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce the consumption of lightweight plastic carrier bags.
column6: The target's focus on plastic reduction aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing plastic use.

column2: Member States should aim to achieve an indicative Union-wide food waste reduction target of 30% by 2025 and 50% by 2030
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Food Waste Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce food waste.
column6: The target's focus on food waste reduction aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing food waste.

column2: From 2019, the minimum collection rate to be achieved annually shall be 65% of the average weight of EEE placed on the market in the three preceding years
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Electronic Waste Collection sub-theme because it aims to increase the collection rate of electronic waste.
column6: The target's focus on electronic waste collection aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting electronic waste collection.

column2: By 31 December 2030, in each safe and secure parking area at least four publicly accessible recharging stations dedicated to heavy-duty electric vehicles with an individual power output of at least 100 kW are deployed
column5: This target is assigned to the Electric Vehicle Charging sub-theme because it aims to increase the deployment of publicly accessible recharging stations for heavy-duty electric vehicles.
column6: The target's focus on electric vehicle charging aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting electric vehicle adoption.

column2: Member States shall ensure that along the TEN-T core and comprehensive networks, publicly accessible recharging pools dedicated to light-duty vehicles are deployed in each direction of travel with a maximum distance of 60 km in-between them
column5: This target is assigned to the Electric Vehicle Charging sub-theme because it aims to increase the deployment of publicly accessible recharging pools for light-duty vehicles.
column6: The target's focus on electric vehicle charging aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting electric vehicle adoption.

column2: The share of biofuels and biogas produced from the feedstock listed in Part B of Annex IX in the energy content of fuels and electricity supplied to the transport sector shall be limited to 1.7%
column5: This target is assigned to the Biofuels sub-theme because it aims to limit the share of biofuels and biogas produced from certain feedstocks in the transport sector.
column6: The target's focus on biofuels aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting sustainable biofuel use.

column2: A target for the use of RFNBO of 2% of the energy used on board by a ship from 2034
column5: This target is assigned to the Alternative Fuels sub-theme because it aims to increase the use of renewable fuels of non-biological origin (RFNBO) in the maritime sector.
column6: The target's focus on alternative fuels aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting sustainable fuel use.

column2: Build 1,000 hydrogen stations by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the Hydrogen Infrastructure sub-theme because it aims to increase the deployment of hydrogen stations.
column6: The target's focus on hydrogen infrastructure aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting hydrogen fuel cell technology.

column2: Synthetic aviation fuels are expected to play a role in the decarbonisation of the sector already by 2030 and should contribute to at least 35% of the aviation fuel mix by 2050
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Aviation Fuels sub-theme because it aims to increase the use of synthetic aviation fuels in the aviation sector.
column6: The target's focus on sustainable aviation fuels aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting sustainable fuel use in aviation.

column2: Scale-up and promote sustainable and socially responsible production methods and circular business models in food processing and retail
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Food Systems sub-theme because it aims to promote sustainable and socially responsible production methods and circular business models in the food sector.
column6: The target's focus on sustainable food systems aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting sustainable food production and consumption.

column2: Ensure Fair, inclusive and ethical value chains
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Fair Trade Practices sub-theme because it aims to ensure fair, inclusive, and ethical value chains in the food sector.
column6: The target's focus on fair trade practices aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting fair and equitable trade practices.

column2: Improve agricultural rules that strengthen the position of farmers, their cooperatives and producer organisations in the food supply chain
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Agricultural Policy sub-theme because it aims to improve agricultural rules to strengthen the position of farmers and their organizations.
column6: The target's focus on agricultural policy aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting policies that support farmers and their organizations.

column2: Reduce the use and risk of chemical pesticides by 50% and the use of more hazardous pesticides by 50%
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Pesticide Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce the use and risk of chemical pesticides and more hazardous pesticides.
column6: The target's focus on pesticide reduction aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing pesticide use.

column2: Increase organic farming to at least 25% of total farmland under organic farming by 2030
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Organic Farming sub-theme because it aims to increase the share of organic farming in total farmland.
column6: The target's focus on organic farming aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting organic farming practices.

column2: Protecting EUâ€™s last remaining primary and old-growth forests
column5: This target is assigned to the Forest Conservation sub-theme because it aims to protect the EU's last remaining primary and old-growth forests.
column6: The target's focus on forest conservation aligns with the sub-theme's objective of preserving forests.

column2: Preserve and protect biodiversity
column5: This target is assigned to the Biodiversity Conservation sub-theme because it aims to preserve and protect biodiversity.
column6: The target's focus on biodiversity conservation aligns with the sub-theme's objective of promoting biodiversity conservation.

column2: Restore degraded ecosystems
column5: This target is assigned to the Ecosystem Restoration sub-theme because it aims to restore degraded ecosystems.
column6: The target's focus on ecosystem restoration aligns with the sub-theme's objective of restoring degraded ecosystems.

column2: Reduce pollution to levels that are no longer harmful to human health and the environment
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Pollution Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce pollution to levels that are no longer harmful to human health and the environment.
column6: The target's focus on pollution reduction aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing pollution.

column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Pesticide Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce the use of chemical pesticides and more hazardous pesticides.
column6: The target's focus on pesticide reduction aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing pesticide use.

column2: Reduce nutrient losses by at least 50%
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Nutrient Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce nutrient losses by at least 50%.
column6: The target's focus on nutrient reduction aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing nutrient pollution.

column2: Reduce waste generation by 50%
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Waste Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce waste generation by 50%.
column6: The target's focus on waste reduction aligns with the sub-theme's objective of decreasing waste.

column2: Reduce microplastic pollution by 30%
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Microplastic Reduction sub-theme because it aims to reduce microplastic pollution by 30%.
